The Gemblaunt Isle was a small island-residence found in the city of Myth Drannor. It was the home of Arguth the Gem-Mage, one of the casters that originally helped raise the mythal that protected the city, prior to the Opening that allowed in various races of Faer√ªn.
The island was a vibrant place, decorated with a rose bushes of many colors, including white, blue, green, and red.
Gemblaunts Isle was situated in the middle of Glyrryrls Pool, within Myth Drannors Kerradunath district. It was accessible by means of walkway that extended on from Gondrims Ride.
The main tower of the islands building-complex was formed of gray stone and highlighted with silver embellishments.
